item.description: Come join us this Sunday for The Big Game and Super Bowl Karaoke. Lets see who can score a touchdown with Karaoke. Lets make it interesting lets make song choices from artists and bands from the San Francisco and Baltimore areas. There are plenty Chris Isaaks, Bonnie Raitt, Dead Kennedys, Jefferson Airplane, 4 Non Blondes, Journey, Toni Braxton, David Byrne and others, see who you can find......Game starts at 6:30pm Karaoke will start approximately at 8pm or so. We will have Free Pizza and Nachos. Game will be broadcast throughout the Bar on all the big screen TVs. We got icy cold beer and a full bar. So come join us fro Super Bowl XLVII.
item.name: "Super Bowl Karaoke" @ The Rosebud
